Name: Overdriven Reloaded
About the game: Shoot' Em Up, Vertical Fast & Fun ! The Overdriven Ship is back : More better, more intense, and more beautiful ! 1 to 4 Players (Local Co-op), 6 Game-Modes : Story, Arcade, Manic (no healthbar for player), The Line, 7 Challenges, 56 Puzzle-Maps ( Color-Reflex Mode / A Match 3 with bullets !) and a Boss Rush ! 2 SpaceShips ( + 1 unlockable), 4 Difficulties (EASY - NORMAL - HARD- NIGHTMARE) in Story Mode, 35 Alien Artifacts to find, 7 space cows to find, A lot of achievements Steam Leaderboards, A great original Rock soundtrack. DLC 'Special Edition Upgrade' now included for free !
